EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2016-04-07-Turbofest-London.EMAIL-Thank You For Attending
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Attending Turbofest London!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, We were honoured to host Turbofest London last week with a full room and a packed speaking agenda. Thank you for joining us and making the event such a great success! Be sure to keep an eye out for the Turbofest recordings which we will be sharing within the next week.
Best,
The VMTurbo Team
